channel.title: Machine Learning on Paramjot Singh
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Paramjot Singh

item.title: Predicting a Numerical Outcome With Linear Models
item.description: In an earlier post, we learned a little bit about inference and some interesting tools that we can employ to make informed decisions based on our data instead of just guessing. Next you show your analysis to your friend who suggested to look for small engine cars to get better fuel economy. He is extremely impressed by the power of statistics and asks you another question. Can we use the data we have to predict the fuel economy of any car from that population that we want?
